narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Irn International Corp. is a Home Health provider based in Denver, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $51.0M in Medicaid payments across 38K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $51.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
